title: Feds Unveil $2,000 Monthly Benefit For Workers Without Income Due To Coronavirus - HuffPost Canada

content: OTTAWA The Liberals are repackaging two previously promised benefits for Canadians whose working lives are disrupted by COVID a change that will almost double direct spending in the government s economic plan to billion Combining the two benefits chars
